subHeading: Candidates must have secured a minimum percentage in 10+2 or equivalent from a recognised board as given below.
content: Open Competition (OC): 55% aggregate in all the four required subjects
BC, BCM: 50% aggregate in all the four required subjects
MBC & DNC: 45% aggregate in all the four required subjects
SC, SCA, ST: A pass in the qualifying examination in all the four required subjects
